san-lo-mvu10:2: evam ukte āyuṣmān mahākāśyapaḥ āyuṣmantaṁ mahākātyāyanam uvāca || dvitīyā bhūmito tṛtīyāṁ bhūmiḥ saṁkramantānāṁ bodhisatvānāṁ naravarātmaja kīdṛśaṁ jāyate cittam iti ||
san-lo-mvu10:8: taṁ ca na ātmasukhārthāya na api bodheḥ kathaṁcana ||
san-lo-mvu10:22: yāvaj jīvante amuṣyāṁ pelāyāṁ duṣkṛtaṁ kṛtaṁ ||
san-lo-mvu10:24: idam uvāca prītātmā asti eṣā subhāṣitā ||
san-lo-mvu10:25: tasya mūlyaṁ tava śīrṣaṁ tyaktvā śīrṣam ity abravīt* |
san-lo-mvu10:26: brūhi brāhmaṇa śīghraṁ me gāthām etāṁ subhāṣitāṁ ||
san-lo-mvu10:31: surūpaṁ nāma bhūmipatiṁ rākṣaso idam abravīt* |
san-lo-mvu10:32: asti subhāṣitā gāthā kreyā yadi krīṇāsi tāṁ ||
san-lo-mvu10:33: tasyā mūlyaṁ kumāraṁ ca devīṁ tvāṁ caiva bhakṣayet* |
san-lo-mvu10:34: gṛhyatāṁ yadi te kṛtyaṁ gāthā hi dharmasaṁhitā ||
san-lo-mvu10:36: gṛhyatāṁ dīyatāṁ gāthā yuktaṁ bhavatu mā ciraṁ ||
san-lo-mvu10:39: uṣitaṁ narakeṣu varaṁ na ca kupuruṣasaṁśrayaniketaḥ ||
san-lo-mvu10:40: amātyaṁ saṁjayaṁ nāma piśāco idam abravīt* |
san-lo-mvu10:41: svakaṁ me hṛdayaṁ dehi śṛṇu gāthāṁ subhāṣitāṁ ||
san-lo-mvu10:42: svakan te hṛdayaṁ demi brūhi gāthāṁ subhāṣitāṁ |
san-lo-mvu10:45: na jātu tṛṇakāṣṭhehi jvalanaḥ śāmyate jvalan* |
san-lo-mvu10:46: na jātu upabhogebhyaḥ tṛṣṇā kāmeṣu śāmyati ||
san-lo-mvu10:47: śreṣṭhiṁ vasundharaṁ nāma daridro idam abravīt* |
san-lo-mvu10:48: iyaṁ subhāṣitā gāthā sarvasvena tu dīyate ||
san-lo-mvu10:50: sarvasvaṁ dadāmi eṣāṁ brūhi gāthāṁ subhaṣitāṁ |
san-lo-mvu10:51: etaṁ santaḥ praśaṁsanti dharmeṣu yat subhāṣitaṁ ||
san-lo-mvu10:53: ākīrṇāny api śūnyāni bāliśā yatra jantavaḥ |
san-lo-mvu10:54: śūnyāny ākīrṇā ca santi ekenāpi prajānatā ||
san-lo-mvu10:55: surūpaṁ nāma rājānaṁ puruṣo etad abravīt* |
san-lo-mvu10:58: jambudvīpaṁ ca te demi sarvaṁ yat kiṁci icchasi |
san-lo-mvu10:59: śīghraṁ subhāṣitaṁ brūhi brūhi satyaṁ yad icchasi ||
san-lo-mvu10:63: satvaraṁ nāma hariṇaṁ lubdhaka idam abravīt* |
san-lo-mvu10:64: iyaṁ subhāṣitā gāthā dehi mānsaṁ śṛṇohi tāṁ ||
san-lo-mvu10:66: śṛṇomi demi te mānsaṁ kṣipraṁ brūhi subhāṣitaṁ ||
san-lo-mvu10:68: satāṁ pādarajaḥ śreyo na suvarṇamayo giriḥ |
san-lo-mvu10:69: so pānsu śokahārāya so giri śokavardhana iti ||
san-lo-mvu10:70: rājānaṁ nāgabhujaṁ nāma taddāso idam abravīt* |
san-lo-mvu10:73: cāturdvīpaṁ ca te rājyaṁ demi kṣipram udīraya |
san-lo-mvu10:74: etāṁ subhāṣitāṁ vācāṁ mā vilamba bravīhi me ti ||
san-lo-mvu10:76: lomotpāṭanatulyam āhu viduṣaḥ prājñasya yā vikriyā
san-lo-mvu10:77: tasmā jñānabalaṁ sametiya punar doṣāṁ samūlāṁ nayā |
san-lo-mvu10:78: chittvā doṣavivarjitena manasā saṁbhāti saṁghaḥ śuciḥ
san-lo-mvu10:79: bhāti lokaguruḥ satām anugato ’nikṣiptabhāro śuciḥ iti ||
san-lo-mvu10:82: bhūyo akṣīṇi tyaktāni śrutvā gāthāṁ subhāṣitāṁ |
san-lo-mvu10:83: agniskandhe punaḥ patitaḥ śrutvā gātḥāṁ subhāṣitāṁ ||
san-lo-mvu10:86: evam ukte āyuṣmān mahākāśyapaḥ āyuṣmantaṁ mahākātyāyanam uvāca || ye punar bho jinaputra bodhisatvāḥ tṛtīyāyāṁ bhūmau vartante kathaṁ caturthāyāṁ bhūmau vivartanti iti || evam ukte āyuṣmān mahākātyāyana āyuṣmantaṁ mahākāśyapam uvāca || caturdaśabhir bho dhutadharmadhara ākārair bodhisatvāḥ tṛtīyāyāṁ bhūmau vartamānāḥ caturthāyāṁ bhūmau vivartante || katamehi caturdaśehi || akṣavaṁkadyūtakrīḍānuyogam anuyuktāś ca bhavanti | atyabhīkṣṇaṁ vivekaṁ sevanti | rājyaṁ ca kārāpayamāṇā lobhenābhibhūtā atrāntaravijitavāsināṁ sarvasvahāriṇo bhavanti | aparādhaṁ ca ananuyujyā vadham ākṣepayanti | badhyāṁś ca na saṁgopāyanti | puruṣāṁś ca vadhrayanti | vipratipannāś ca bhavanti | na ca bhogayātrāyāṁ saṁvibhajanti vidyamāneṣu vibhaveṣu | pravrajitvā ca samyaksaṁbuddhānāṁ bhāṣatāṁ vā bāhuśrutyaṁ na paryāpnuvanti | purā praṇidhitvā ca bāhuśrutyaṁ na deśayanti | āmiṣapratibaddhāṁś ca sevanti na dharmapratibaddhā | na cābhīkṣṇaṁ buddhavarṇaṁ bhāṣanti | samyaksaṁbuddhāṁś ca lokasamatāye deśenti | na ca samyaksaṁbuddhāṁ lokottarā iti bodhayanti || imehi bho dhutadharmadhara caturdaśabhir ākāraiḥ bodhisatvāḥ tṛtīyāyāṁ bhūmau vartamānāś caturthāyāṁ bhūmau vivartanti || ye hi kecid bho dhatudharmadhara bodhisatvāḥ tṛtīyāyāṁ bhūmau vartamānāḥ caturthāyāṁ bhūmau vivartensuḥ vivartanti vivartiṣyanti vā sarve te imehi caturdaśehir ākārair nāto bhūya iti ||
san-lo-mvu10:87: evam ukte āyuṣmān mahākāśyapa āyuṣmantaṁ mahākātyāyanam uvāca || ye punar bho jinaputra bodhisatvā avaivartiyā prathamaṁ cittam utpādayanti bodhāya kevarūpeṇa sukhena yujyanti kevattakāś ca satvā sukhasātasaṁgatā bhavantīti || evam ukte āyuṣmān mahākātyāyana āyuṣmantaṁ mahākāśyapaṁ gāthābhir adhyabhāṣi ||
san-lo-mvu10:104: atha khalu nāmatidevo nāma trāyastriṁśako bodhisatvo bhūto ekāṁsam uttarāsaṅgaṁ kṛtvā yena bhagavanto dṛṣṭo tenāṁjaliṁ praṇamayya bhagavantam abhistutaḥ saṁmukhaṁ vaśībhūtagaṇasya imaiḥ ślokaiḥ ||
san-lo-mvu10:108: te vande śāntaṁ te dāntaṁ + + + smṛtivinayakuśalaṁ surāsurasatkṛtaṁ ||
san-lo-mvu10:109: dīrghaṁ kālaṁ citrācāro kuśala ativipulaphalado bhavakṣayakāṁkṣayā
san-lo-mvu10:110: ślāghyair nānaiḥ maitrīpūrvair bahuvividhajanitakuśalaiḥ śamābhimukho muniḥ |
san-lo-mvu10:111: tyaktvā āvāsaṁ nityaṁ vidvān asurasuramahitaṁ sukhitaṁ satvapratibodhane
san-lo-mvu10:112: ikṣvākūnāṁ vaṁśodbhūto dharaṇitalam avatari yaśaḥsthito acalādhṛtiḥ ||
san-lo-mvu10:113: māyāyā devyāḥ kukṣismiṁ praviśiṣu sa kumudasadṛśo varo gajarūpavāṁ
san-lo-mvu10:115: satvāṁ mattāṁ andhāṁ dṛṣṭvā vimatipathaviṣamapatitāṁ samuddharituṁ prajāḥ
san-lo-mvu10:116: tasmiṁ kāle ratnākīrṇā vividhanidhinicayabharitā cacāla vasundharā
san-lo-mvu10:117: taṁ śākyendraṁ cāritrāḍhyaṁ smṛtinibhṛtam adhiguṇacitaṁ avandi mahāmuniṁ ||
san-lo-mvu10:118: prāsādāgre devī māyā surapatipravarabhavane vā sukhaiḥ pravicāryate
san-lo-mvu10:119: nṛtyair gītair lāsyair vādyaiḥ śravaṇahṛdinayanasubhagaiḥ sureṣv iva devatā |
san-lo-mvu10:120: sā devī rājānaṁ khinnaṁ vadati vanavaraṁ mahipate vrajeyaṁ yad’ icchasi
san-lo-mvu10:122: gatvā tasmiṁ strībhiḥ sārdhaṁ pravicarati muditasukhitā vane vanalolayā
san-lo-mvu10:123: sā codyānaṁ paryaṇvantī taruṇalatakiśalayadharāṁ dadarśa ’tha lumbinīṁ |
san-lo-mvu10:125: sā tatra śākhāṁ rakṣantī janayi jinam ajitamanasaṁ mahāmunim uttamaṁ ||
san-lo-mvu10:126: śītoṣṇe ca dve vāridhāre pravarakusumabharite jinaṁ yatra snapayiṁsu taṁ
san-lo-mvu10:127: devā jāyantaṁ jātamātraṁ nṛpatiṁ surabhuvanamahitaṁ trilokamaheśvaraṁ |
san-lo-mvu10:128: sānukrośaṁ lokātītaṁ śaraṇam iha divi ca bhuvi cā jarāmaraṇāntakaṁ
san-lo-mvu10:129: aprāptaṁ taṁ bhūmau dhīraṁ kamaladalasadṛśanayanaṁ surāsuranandanaṁ ||
san-lo-mvu10:130: hṛṣṭā tuṣṭā devā sarve tridaśaprabhṛtibhavanacyutā pratisthihiṣur vanaṁ
san-lo-mvu10:131: ikṣvākūnāṁ vaṁśodbhūto dharaṇitalam avatari yaśasthito acalādhṛti |
san-lo-mvu10:132: vikramāṁś ca sapta pūrṇaṁ mṛgavṛṣarājāmatir iva rasamānīkaṁ
san-lo-mvu10:133: jyeṣṭho śreṣṭho lokāgro haṁ na ca mama puna jaramaraṇā hato bhav’ upadravaḥ ||
san-lo-mvu10:135: hastā muktaṁ sthāye sāmaṁ samabhicchadi nṛpatitanayaṁ vihāyase utthitaṁ |
san-lo-mvu10:136: vālaiś cougraiḥ śaṁkhājābhair mṛdubhir upacitam anupamaṁ divaukasanirmitaṁ
san-lo-mvu10:137: uccair daṇḍaṁ muktāśvetaṁ bhramati maṇikanakavikṛtaṁ sucāmaravījanaṁ ||
san-lo-mvu10:138: dundubhyo cā meghonnādā pavanakhagagaganaparigā nadanti mahatsvarāḥ
san-lo-mvu10:139: puṣpaughāś cā divyā sṛṣṭā marubhi jinabalavaramukhe sacandanacūrṇitāḥ |
san-lo-mvu10:140: saṁtoṣātīśayayuktebhiḥ suramarū jayati sukhakaro rase ravaṇīśataiḥ
san-lo-mvu10:141: kṣubdhāsannā nānāratnā udadhibhuvi talasalilayos tathāgatatejasā iti ||
